程序包 org.bukkit.scoreboard

package org.bukkit.scoreboard
用于管理客户端计分板显示系统的类.
  • 相关程序包
    程序包
    说明
    org.bukkit
    Bukkit的常用类.
  • 类
    说明
    Criterias
    游戏内标准计分项目（生命、击杀信息、死亡次数等）.
    DisplaySlot
    向玩家显示目标位置.
    NameTagVisibility
    已过时。
    replaced by Team.OptionStatus
    Objective
    计分板对象: 显示特定条目分数.
    Score
    A score entry for an entry on an objective.
    Scoreboard
    代表计分板.
    ScoreboardManager
    计分板管理
    Team
    A team on a scoreboard that has a common display theme and other properties.
    Team.Option
    Represents an option which may be applied to this team.
    Team.OptionStatus
    How an option may be applied to members of this team.

此版本文档已过时, 内容不再更新. 于 2022.10.01 使用 Java 17 重置.
